seo: Spring Cloud,CVE-2022-22963,漏洞检测,命令注入,SpEL表达式
summary: 该插件用于检测Spring Cloud应用中是否存在CVE-2022-22963漏洞，即SpEL表达式命令注入漏洞，通过构造特定请求来验证目标系统是否受影响。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the CVE-2022-22963 vulnerability exists in Spring Cloud applications, which is a command injection vulnerability in SpEL expressions. It verifies if the target system is affected by constructing specific requests.
